name: VIR-272.03 Verify that the category check boxes are checked in by default to view all categories

userStory.narrative:
As a Chief shopper, I require the ability to manage the categories
that each school will be able to view on the shop.virco site
so that I can control the consistency for the school.

title: VIR-272.03 Verify that the category check boxes are checked in by default to view all categories
